messageBody:
Ahuja, Mona R wrote:

> The problem here is its a singleton class so I cannot extend this class. I
> need to some how pass the mockconnection object to this class.

My suggestions:

1. Google "Use your singletons wisely," then read the article.
2. Make the DAO constructor public.
3. Generalize the type of the constructor's parameter to "DataSource".
4. Now in your tests, supply a mock DataSource which serves mock
Connection objects.
